splasher:compose

Full name:

org.bitstrings.maven.plugins:splasher-maven-plugin:1.1.0:compose

Description:

Compose a splash screen.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • The goal is thread-safe and supports parallel builds.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: generate-resources.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
canvas Canvas - The canvas.

See Reference: Drawables.
outputImageFile File - Output image file. If the image format is not explicitly specified then the file extension is used.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
outputImageFormat String - Output image type. The supported formats are those of the JDK in use. i.e.: Java 7 supports GIF, PNG, JPG
resources ResourceProvider[] - Resources declaration used for drawing on canvas. 
Example:
    <resources>
      <loadImage>
        <imageFile>logo.png</imageFile>
        <name>logo</name>
      </loadImage>
    </resources>

See Reference: Resources.

Parameter Details

canvas:

The canvas.

See Reference: Drawables.
  • Type: org.bitstrings.maven.plugins.splasher.Canvas
  • Required: Yes

outputImageFile:

Output image file. If the image format is not explicitly specified then the file extension is used.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes

outputImageFormat:

Output image type. The supported formats are those of the JDK in use. i.e.: Java 7 supports GIF, PNG, JPG
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No

resources:

Resources declaration used for drawing on canvas. 
Example:
    <resources>
      <loadImage>
        <imageFile>logo.png</imageFile>
        <name>logo</name>
      </loadImage>
    </resources>

See Reference: Resources.
  • Type: org.bitstrings.maven.plugins.splasher.ResourceProvider[]
  • Required: No
